HOWEVER, you can add other girls to the story but they can be a giantess for a short time only (unless if the main girl give away a shrunken person and you want to fallow the story of that person) . 11.title: Junichi Tachibana's route!

113.content:
"Come on, Junichi! Hurry up!" Haruka said with a giggle as she kept running forward.

"Hold on Haruka, I'm running as fast as I can! Jeez, what is it that has you so excited today anyway?" Junichi replied.

"I told you already, It's a surprise! Now come on!"

Junichi simply sighed and continued to chase after his hyperactive girlfriend across the school campus. He was more than used to her playfully energetic personally by now, but this was something else. He had never seen her so excited before. She had been acting like this all day, but she refused to tell him what it was that had her so excited. All she said was that she had a surprise to show him during their lunch break, and Junichi was growing more and more curious about it by the minute.

Eventually, Haruka lead Junichi to a familiar hole in the fence, and crawled under it to get off campus. She then waited for Junichi to crawl under as well before running off again. By now, Junichi had a pretty good idea where his girlfriend was leading him. After several more minutes of chasing Haruka down, his assumptions were confirmed. His girlfriend had just lead him to the old tool shed where she had allowed him to kiss her for the first time. Entering the shed, Haruka beckoned Junichi to follow her inside. As soon as he was inside the shed with her, Haruka shut the door behind them and smiled at her boyfriend.

"Okay Haruka, you lead me all the way here... So what is it that you wanted to show me?" Junichi asked, now fairly tired from running all the way here.

"Well, before I show you... You do trust me, right?" Haruka asked, suddenly sounding a bit nervous.

"Of course, Haruka! You're my girlfriend, after all... If I didn't trust you, then what kind of boyfriend would I be?"

"Hehe, that's why I like you Junichi. You're just so nice."

"Thanks Haruka, but back to the surprise that you brought me all the way here for..."

"Oh yeah, right! Okay Junichi, you know how much I like things that are cute and small, right?"

Junichi simply nodded.

"And you know how much I like you, right?"

Junichi began to blush as he nodded again. Rather than saying anything else, Haruka simply reached into her pocket and pulled out what appeared to be a small remote control.

"See this? It's a special remote that lets me shrink and grow anything to any size I want! Isn't that cool?"

Junichi, thinking that this was all just one of Haruka's jokes, simply laughed. As though reading his thoughts, Haruka spoke up again.

"I'm not joking, Junichi! This thing is the real deal! Watch this..."

Haruka then aimed the remote at one of the crates in the corner of the room. Pressing a button on the remote, a bright light fired from it and hit the crate. To his amazement, Junichi watched as the crate suddenly shrank down to half its original size. Seeing the look of shock on her boyfriend's face, Haruka simply giggled and blasted the crate once more, this time returning it to its original size.

"So, do you believe me now Junichi?"

"Well, It'd be pretty hard not to believe you after seeing that happen... So, what are you gonna do with that thing?"

"I was thinking that I could shrink you down and keep you as my cute little pet for a while. Only if you're okay with it, of course."

"Ummm, how long are we talking about here?"

"Just for a week or so... I promise I'll take really good care of you and turn you back afterward! If you don't like it, I'll promise to never do it again... But if you do like it, then we can make it a regular thing to do together! So, what do you say?"

"Uh, well, as long as you promise not to take advantage of me while I'm small... I guess it's okay with me..."

Haruka's face beamed with excitement.

"Thanks Junichi, I promise I won't do anything to you unless you agree to it. Let's see... To get started, I think I'll shrink you down to ___________."

anyways, I have few rules for the story...

I will NOT allow

I will give Gift points to those who add good chapters!!

first five writers who add good chapters will get 1000 gift point for each good chapter!!

HAVE FUN AND GO CRAZY!!!


==========================================


[from wikipidia]

Two years ago, Junichi Tachibana got his heart broken by a girl who stood him up on a date on Christmas Eve. Now a second-year student in high school, Junichi is wary of love because of his past and dislikes celebrating Christmas. However this Christmas, his encounter with one of six girls from his school, Haruka Morishima, Kaoru Tanamachi, Sae Nakata, Ai Nanasaki, Rihoko Sakurai, or Tsukasa Ayatsuji will finally open up his heart to love again.

Main Charecters

You - you is you, so try to fit yourself in, and be creative and create your own character.
--------------
Junichi Tachibana - The lead male protagonist of the story. He has a hard time opening up to others due to a trauma two years ago when his date stood him up on Christmas Eve which left him heart broken. He also fears heights, as he feels uncomfortable when riding elevators. He proves that he can do anything what he takes for any one of the 6 lead females in these series. He is good in school, yet he sleeps or thinks of her during class.

Picture
http://cdn.myanimelist.net/images/characters/15/94527.jpg
----------

Tsukasa Ayatsuji - Junichi's class representative, who is both a hard worker and a person who is willing to take on any task that no one else will. While she acts kind and friendly, it is actually a facade that secretly hides the real her, who is manipulative and cunning. In Amagami SS+ her arc will be played in episodes 1 & 2, she is running for the president, with Junichi as her vice-president. Her rival is Noriko Kurosawa, who also picked Junichi as her vice-president.

Rihoko Sakurai - She is Junichi's childhood friend who, despite having a big appetite, avidly reads the dieting books in their school library. She is a member of the Tea Club.

Pictures
http://static.zerochan.net/full/24/15/298274.jpg
http://static.zerochan.net/full/25/04/620225.jpg
-----------

Risa Kamizaki - A secret character in the game and anime. A shy girl, Risa has been in love with Junichi since grade school and has been secretly stalking him since. Risa is also the one responsible for what happened two years ago under the belief she was protecting Junichi.
